title: Plant Growth
content:
Plant Growth Level 3 Transmutation Spell Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their movement speed quartered. 10 turns 6m 18m Action Level 3 Spell Slot

Level 3 Transmutation Spell

Make weeds burst from the ground and smother the area. Creatures moving through the weeds have their movement speed quartered.

Plant Growth is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Plant Growth is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for deal
